mapper.select: select r.* from sys_approval_request as r left join sys_user as u on r.applicant = u.userId where u.userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_approval_request(applicant, deviceCategory, deviceType, deviceName, quantity, reason, timestamp, status, createdAt, updatedAt) values (#{applicant},#{deviceCategory},#{deviceType},#{deviceName},#{quantity},#{reason},#{timestamp},#{status},#{createdAt},#{updatedAt})
mapper.select: select approverId from sys_approver where costCenter = #{costCenter} and role = 'manager'
mapper.insert: insert into sys_approval_flow(approvalId, approverId, stage, status, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES (#{approvalId},#{approverId},#{stage},#{status},#{createdAt},#{updatedAt})
insert into sys_approval_token(flowId, token, createdAt, updatedAt, used, expireTime) VALUES (#{flowId},#{token},#{createdAt},#{updatedAt},#{used},#{expireTime})
